title: Gambler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a person to gamble on at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you choose a person to gamble on, you are gambling on them surviving until the end of the game.
- If a player you have gambled on dies, you must wait one night before gambling on another player.
- You may gamble on three players. You may not change your gamble unless the player you gambled on dies.
- If all three of the players you gambled on die, you will commit suicide out of shame.
- If you die, your gamble still rides on the last person you gambled on.
- You may not gamble on yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Gamble on a person who survives until the end of the game.

desc:
Post 247
*You lose all bets that you don't take.*
